class_notes: This class contains synchronous and asynchronous material. It will meet synchronously at the listed day and  time, with all other content to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: This course explores various aspects of life and society in Japan, including writing, gender, memory and history, geography and the environment, aesthetics, and the formation of national identity.
